There isn't life after death. because your bible teaches you this does not necessarily constitute reality. Most religions are culture based, hence most Christians cannot specify why they follow in that faith other than they were born into believing a fictional story written by """"who knows"""" and edited by king James et al...to suite the reader. How different are you from other animals that walk this earth? Same animals that you hunt down and kill to satisfy your thirst and hunger...same animals that share most anatomical composition as we humans, and you tell me those animals are not worthy of your heaven?
